name: Carl Paolino
bio: Hi! I'm a passionate software engineer with experience in full-stack development, machine learning, and modern web technologies. I love delivering innovative solutions and exploring new technologies that make a real impact.

Collaborative teams working on cutting-edge technology
Opportunities to mentor and learn from experienced engineers
